section.title: ADT tools
section.para: The Android Development Tools (ADT) project provide Eclipse and IntellJ based tooling to development Android applications.

note.para: Unfortunately the ADT team were not available for an interview. Most of documentation of the tooling can be found under here: Tool project side .

section.title: Contributing to the ADT project
section.para: The contribution process to ADT is based on Gerrit but uses another tool called repo. The contribution process is described here: Contributing to ADT .

section.title: Building the tools
section.para: How to build the Eclipse based ADT tooling is described in the following page: Building ADT .
